name: Carpet Cleaning Ilford
overview: Carpet Cleaning Ilford Ltd is locally based and operated company that have been catering to the cleaning needs and requirements of residents and business for more than a decade. The company has built a reputation for high quality results and excellent customer care. It provides a wide range of carpet cleaning services including: dry carpet cleaning steam carpet cleaning deep carpet cleaning and more traditional approaches such as shampooing On top of that, the company have recently decided to expand its cleaning portfolio and has added a number of additional services like: Upholstery cleaning Curtain cleaning Mattress cleaning Sofa Cleaning Hard floor cleaning
